pages.text: I found some notes about a magical substance called $(item)Alkahest/$. They kept going on and on about how it's the "universal solvent" and how it would revolutionize all of alchemy. They even left instructions for a device that can make $(item)Alkahest/$ by interacting with the aether, whatever that means, but left no mention of whether they were successful or what $(item)Alkahest/$ does.
The notes also mentioned needing a $(item)Divining Stone/$ but not what for.
